name: Be My Player 2...?
description:
DATT2310: Game Design and Development II Vertical Slice Submission

Lab 02 Group 3

Step into the shoes of a content creator and influencer in a vibrant content house. Experience the highs and lows of streaming, grow your community, and discover romance with two intriguing characters: the arrogant yet talented rhythm gamer, Alex, and the quiet but compassionate platform speedrunner, Matt. Will you be able to win the hearts of Alex or Matt? Find out in Be My Player 2...?!

Deneisha Dennis, Gong-Fan (Billy) Bao, Timothy Lai, Maureen Navera, Zhuan (Warren) Wang, Justin Cho


Coding: Gong-Fan (Billy) Bao , Timothy Lai, Justin Cho, Zhuan (Warren) Wang

Artwork: Maureen Navera, Gong-Fan (Billy) Bao

Narrative and Dialogue: Deneisha Dennis

Outsourced Assets:

Artwork

  • Vector Bedroom Interior (used for Alex’s bedroom) By upklyak on Freepik
  • Free vector cartoon gamer room illustration (used for Matt’s bedroom) By pikisuperstar on Freepik
  • Free vector organic flat gamer room illustration (used for player’s room) By freepik on Freepik
  • Dating Sim UI Pack by LoudEyes: https://loudeyes.itch.io/dating-sim-ui-pack
  • PixelWallpaper: Space By BloodClients: https://bloodclients.itch.io/spacewallpaper
  • Pixel Adventure 1 by Pixel Frog: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

Music/Sound Effects

  • Sound Effects: www.zapsplat.com
  • “Magical Gateway”, “Better Days Ahead” and “Innocent Years” by Eric Matyas: www.soundimage.org
  • “Lost Spaceship’s Signal” and “Valley of Spirits” by DavidKBD
  • “Epic Song” by BoxCat Games
